overview:
Jean-Philippe Tripet, managing partner and founder of Aravis, has over 15 years experience as portfolio manager and financial analyst. In 1994 he co-founded the Lombard Odier Immunology fund that became one of the most successful healthcare funds in Europe under his supervision. He has supervised over 70 private investments.

Since 1994 Jean-Philippe Tripet has participated actively to the launch and financing of many successful start-up companies such as Modex, Novimmune, Cytos, Genedata, Esbatech and Novalon. He is a member of the board of directors of Evolva, MerLion, Symetis Omeros, S Bio, TelorMedix and Synosia.

He has a degree in business administration from the University of Geneva, did graduate studies in San Diego (USA) and is a Chartered Financial Analyst.
